Location for Conducting a Claims Folder Review
A representative who holds a written authorization or consent to review a claims folder may review the claims folder within an RO in a space designated for such reviews.
If the authorization or consent is limited, then the representative may review
only
the information in the claims folder that the Veteran has authorized or consented for the representative to review.
The RO director may permit accredited representatives of service organizations to review a claims folder at the desk of the accredited representative.
References
:  For more information on
the review of the claims folder, see
38 CFR 1.525
, and
limited representation, see
M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, 2.A.2.d
.
